text: Marvin John Nance (December 21, 1943 – December 30, 1996) was an American actor. He worked with moviemaker David Lynch many times. He was in Lynch's first movie Eraserhead (1977). He was also in Twin Peaks (1990–1991) as Pete Martell. Nance died at his apartment in South Pasadena, California on December 30, 1996, one week after his 53rd birthday. The cause of death was a subdural hematoma from an injury he got in a street fight the morning before. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Deaths from subdural hematoma Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Boston Category:Actors from Pasadena, California Category:Deaths by beating Category:American crime victims Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Dallas
title: Jack Nance
